alert.note: Alert for Clermont; Clinton; Greene; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN CLERMONT, EASTERN WARREN, NORTHWESTERN CLINTON AND SOUTHWESTERN GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Morrow, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Xenia, Lebanon, Wilmington, Bellbrook, Blanchester, Waynesville, Morrow, South Lebanon, Woodville, Maineville, Clarksville, Harveysburg, Spring Valley, Corwin, Midland, Port William, Butlerville, Pleasant Plain, Melvin and State Route 123 at State Route 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
